website_summaries.verdict: Good looks, accurate time, practical design, and exceptional warranty make this timepiece a top choice as a gift for someone special or a treat for yourself.
pros: Handsome design with skeleton face and intricate etching give it contemporary and traditional appeal
Owners rave that it's even more attractive in person
cons: Some reports of malfunction after several months, but the upside is the limited lifetime warranty

customer_reviews.title: Treasure!
customer_reviews.text: Hi! I just got the package today. thank you! It's a really wonderful pocket watch and I was surprised that it costed way cheaper than the pricetag that came along with it. It's way more than worth it. It's definitely a treasure for keeping. It's a sturdy watch, and the picture, definitely does not do the watch enough justice cause it's ten times better when you watch the actual watch function in action. The details are fantastic. I wouldn't think twice about buying or any other charles hubert paris pocket watch. thank you so much for the great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Don M. Logarta

customer_reviews.title: So Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my boyfriend as a first anniversary gift. He loved it. The Good - It is just as beautiful as the picture depicts. - It is high quality. I was slightly afraid when I purchased it that it would be cheap quality. - It keeps time well. However, my boyfriend has only had it a few months and doesn't use it on the regular. - It comes with a chain. The listing does not depict this, so it was a pleasant surprise. - The open face gives it a beautiful vintage look There was nothing bad about this watch, it is beautiful and sophisticated. It made an excellent anniversary gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My first Charles-Hubert pocket watch... I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I like side-winders! This is a nice watch, well made, looks good, and it keeps time well. At first I was a bit worried about some of the cutaway work on the face cover snagging on something when it is put into/taken out of a pocket but, as long as you keep it in it's pouch, there shouldn't be a problem. At first I was only going to give this watch 4 stars; but FOR THIS PRICE RANGE I give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: HowdyDave

customer_reviews.title: Charles-Hubert, Paris 3928 pocket watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Had it about a week and it does a great job of keeping time. It's a wind-up mechanical, so I don't expect it to be perfect...but after almost a week it is still accurate to the minute! I wish the entire front cover was completely sealed, but it is only the center of the cover that has the acrylic/plastic. I worry about dust and lint getting into the mechanism from my pocket. Quite honestly, I think it is a beautiful piece that I never tire of looking at and I enjoy the occasional winding that it needs whenever I see that the inner spring has become unwound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pocket Watch
customer_reviews.text: This a great quality pocket watch. I bought it as a gift for my husband. I love just sitting and watching the gears move. I love that it doesn't need batteries. We have had since early this year and it still looks like new. Definitely happy about the wonderful quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nyckee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Fantastic workmanship and quality. I am so happy i bought this item. It shines and looks super expensive. You can see the gears of the watch and watch it work. I was blown away when i received this and my fiance when crazy over it. He wears it everyday and absolutely loves it. Highly recommend this item. Trust me you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tevillis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This piece is so beautiful, the picture doesn't really do it justice. I am giving it to my boyfriend for Christmas and I know he will love it. I had looked at so many pocket watches over the last few months and none of them compare to this one. It has a good weight to it and the craftsmanship looks durable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ravell

customer_reviews.title: SHOULD HAVE LEARNED FROM THE FIRST
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these to quit running for no good reason. Attractive watch unless you want to use it for telling time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: The pictures don't do it justice however it's not terribly accurate. Gains 15 to 20 seconds a day. For its price range I suspect that's about as well as can be expected but it keeps me from giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This was a graduation gift for my son. He loved it. The packaging was nice & included instructions, a pouch and nice chain. It was the striking memorable gift I'd hoped for. Downside to the see through design is that there's no place to engrave.
customer_reviews.author: C. Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but we did return it because my husband wanted something a little simpler. I bought it for him for his birthday. I thought it was beautiful :)
customer_reviews.author: Na0515

customer_reviews.title: I love watching him check the time now
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband. He loves it! He's fascinated with the gears. I love watching him check the time now, especially in church :)
customer_reviews.author: Amalia Lofthouse

customer_reviews.title: Affordable but looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who'd wanted a pocket watch for a long time. Beautiful, looks expensive, he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Yg

customer_reviews.title: Works good, looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I didnt wear the watch so much so far, but I like that it is exactly like the photo and what is important it does not have this cheezy cheap look like all those chaeaper watches. Works good, looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Mackovjak

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy Looking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son's 40th birthday. He was very excited to receive it. It's very nice looking and the packaging and the box were also very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: deecee

customer_reviews.title: I like it, I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, keeps good time. What more could you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Dave Pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: You will not be disappointed. Just as advertised. It is well made and looks like a 19th-century timepiece. Very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: RH. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made watch, will purchase this maker and type again in a different version.
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simply beautiful. My son loves this watch. The intricacies are fabulous. Well made, nice weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: shawnielea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight, sturdy. Comes with chain. Can see gears from both front and back. I know he'll love it...
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch (especially for the money). Accurate to within a minute or so per day.
customer_reviews.author: rmr

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, takes me back in time.
customer_reviews.text: I give this watch a 5 star rating for its quality and looks. My grandchildren are amazed by the see thru windows on front and back so you can see the movement. I inspected it with a 4 power magnifying glass and even at that level the quality of the watch comes through. If you like pocket watches as I do this one should impress.
customer_reviews.author: Julian K.

customer_reviews.title: Anniversary Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as an anniversary gift. He's never owned one before and I thought it would be great for him. He adores it. It was a bit expensive but a great buy. I'm very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Karishma Vaughn Ditzler

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this as a birthday present for my boyfriend. He absolutely love it! It looks classy and elegant and the chrome finish gives it an almost eerie shine. Definitely what I was looking for :)
customer_reviews.author: Jone

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Second watch I purchased that stopped running within three months. I am sending back. RWL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made watch especially considering the cost. it's handsome in appearance. i received the watch, but in two weeks it began to stop when I opened the cover. Amazon quickly replaced it with no questions. The second one thus far runs well enough, but make certain the stem is well pushed in when setting the time. I hope it continues to run accurately inasmuch as I like its design and weight.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my boyfriend for Valentine's day ! He loves it ! Great quality for the price ! Very sturdy and pretty !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You have to re set it everyday but it's a great
customer_reviews.text: My bf loves it. You have to re set it everyday but it's a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Klariza

customer_reviews.title: The watch is beautiful and I get lots of complements about it
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful and I get lots of complements about it. It is a smaller size than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best pocket watches I have ever handled!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I picked up this watch I thought that it was worth more than the meager $90 ($95 after tax) that I payed for it. I will be with me every time I dress up, and I love the mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Pianoman

customer_reviews.title: I have had this watch for a couple of weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this watch for a couple of weeks and it broke today after only three turns of the dial.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: This watch was more beautiful than the actual pic that is displayed. I got it as a gift for my boyfriend. He loved it!!! It's absolutely stunning. The pic displayed does not show you the back it's partially clear and shows the insides. I wanted to engrave it since I thought the back was mat and flat but when I saw it I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonipink

customer_reviews.title: Brought for Valentine's day for my husband and we love it! Didn't know it came with the chain ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought for Valentine's day for my husband and we love it! Didn't know it came with the chain though so I bought one which sucked!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Perthel

customer_reviews.title: This watch is beautiful and feels very high quality and like it will ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful and feels very high quality and like it will last for many years. The only matter I can't comment on much is the mechanical aspect as I have never had one before. I have it what felt like a full wind the first night and it was out less than 24 hours later, so I assumed it needs to be wound more often and started winding it about every 6 hours or whenever I think about it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Norton

customer_reviews.title: Lovely piece
customer_reviews.text: At the price, I thought that this watch would be of lesser quality but it looks as lovely as it does in the pictures, and has a heft of a much more expensive watch. We've only had it since Christmas, but my husband winds it daily and it doesn't seem to be losing time at all. He cannot wear a wrist watch and finds it useful to have on a table to glance at the time in a meeting, instead of having to reactivate his sleeping phone screen, which can give away that he wants it to be over, soon!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Really like the intricate details that went into the design of ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present and the person received it just absolutely loves it. Really like the intricate details that went into the design of this pocket watch. Also, the main reason why I chose to buy this one over the others is because the front cover when closed, the inside of the watch can be seen.
customer_reviews.author: MadiGal

customer_reviews.title: This watch is the most overrated watch.  .
customer_reviews.text: The worse purchase I have ever made from Amazon. I would not give you five dollars today for this watch. The bad part about it is I paid $91 Dollars for lit.
customer_reviews.author: carroll weakley

customer_reviews.title: and it's BEAUTIFUL! it was a Valentine's Day gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in the two-tone, and it's BEAUTIFUL! it was a Valentine's Day gift for my boyfriend and he loves it! the weight of the watch and self=winding features, in addition to the skeleton view of the mechanics are stunning! so so happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: kim deskins

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chrome pocket watch
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful chrome pocket watch! I like the smaller size, ability to tell time whether open or closed, and illuminated dials. Keeps good time, so far. Cool to view working mechanisms from front or rear, open or closed again. The scrolling is beautiful and front roman numericals give added personality. And very quiet. Its a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Looked great, died fast.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and my husband loved it, but it stopped running after two months.
customer_reviews.author: Pan's Oak

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: An amazingly beautiful watch. I receive a lot of compliments on it. It doesn't feel cheap; the skeleton design is quite neat. It's nice to know that the watch carries a lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C.

customer_reviews.title: Charles Hubert
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and Incredible watch, just right the photo, and over my expectation!
customer_reviews.author: agatocb17

product_meta.title: Charles-Hubert, Paris 3928 Classic Collection Chrome Finish Brass Mechanical Pocket Watch
product_meta.description:
This silver tone pocket watch combines an eye-catching skeleton dial with a reliable 17-jewel mechanical movement. A Roman numeral hour markers edgned on front cover provides a contemporary look of a classic style pocket watch. This pocket watch comes with matching curb chain, limited lifetime warranty, and deluxe paper gift box.

Since 1990, Charles-Hubert Pans has been a major influence in the United States watch industry. By including both retro and contemporary designs in its line, Charles-Hubert Paris has established a large and loyal following. With its unprecedented Lifetime Warranties, exceptional quality standards and affordable pricing, the future looks very bright for Charles-Hubert Paris.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :4.9 x 4.6 x 1.5 inches; 4 Ounces
 * Item model number :3928
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :September 28, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Charles-Hubert, Paris
